sternheimer.help: Perform linear perturbation calcualtion using the sc sternheimer method

orb.help: Input orb file to start computation from

step.help: Number of points evaluated between omega and omegafin

resolution.help: Number of points used in Output

imshift.help: Frequency shift in imaginary direction for Padeapproximation in Polarizability calculations in eV

level.help: If gwsternheimer is chosen this is the level of which the self energy is calculated

quadrature_scheme.help: Quadrature scheme used for frequency calculation in gwsternheimer

quadrature_order.help: Quadrature order used for frequency calculation in gwsternheimer

do_precalc_fxc.help: Do precalculation of dxc integral. Recommended for small molecules but not for large ones
